lead_paragraph: Brazilian soccer legend Pele is suing Samsung in Chicago federal court, claiming the electronics company improperly used his identity in The New York Times.

headline.main: Pele Sues Samsung Over Improper Use of Image in Newspaper Ad
headline.print_headline: Pele Sues Samsung Over Improper Use of Image in Newspaper Ad

snippet: Brazilian soccer legend Pele is suing Samsung in Chicago federal court, claiming the electronics company improperly used his identity in The New York Times....
